definition: to prevent/to take precautions against/to protect/to guard against/precautionary/prophylactic
to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent

pinyin: ji2 bing4 yu4 fang2 zhong1 xin1

sentences.english: Objective To explore the effective nursing in three-stage prevention of periodontitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索一種有效落實牙周病的三期預防的護理措施。

sentences.english: Residents of the U. S. do not need to take iodine pills to prevent radiation-induced thyroid cancer.
sentences.chinese: 美國居民無須服用碘片來預防輻射造成的甲狀腺癌症。

sentences.english: Hygiene has evolved into preventive medicine.
sentences.chinese: 衛生學已逐漸發展成爲預防醫學。

sentences.english: To prevent the formation of urinary calculi，especially in cases where they tend to recur.
sentences.chinese: 用於預防尿路，特別是易發部位的結石的形成。

sentences.english: The children were vaccinated against cholera.
sentences.chinese: 那些小孩接受了霍亂預防注射。

sentences.english: What precautionary measures should Asthma sufferers take in their daily lives?
sentences.chinese: 哮喘病患者日常生活中應採取什麼預防措施？

sentences.english: Read about about the causes of diabetes and how to prevent it.
sentences.chinese: 讀一些關於糖尿病的誘因並學會如何做好預防措施。

sentences.english: They don't know how to stop or prevent it.
sentences.chinese: 他們不知道如何制止或預防這種恐懼。

sentences.english: Condusion Enlarges to the youth group's treatment dynamics, completes the prevention work.
sentences.chinese: 結論加大對青年組的治療力度，做好預防工作。

sentences.english: Preventive measures in industry include inerting and elimination of ignition sources.
sentences.chinese: 工業預防措施包括惰化和消除點火源。

sentences.english: Always pay attention to safety, prevent accidents everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 時時注意安全，處處預防事故。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the AIDS prevention knowledge among middle-school students in the rural areas.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解農村中學生預防艾滋病知識水平。

sentences.english: Objective To assess the effect of polysaccharide sulphate on prevention of postoperative intestinal adhesions.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察藻酸雙酯鈉預防術後腸粘連的作用。

sentences.english: The Liganshu granules have the preventive effect on immune liver injury in mice.
sentences.chinese: 利肝舒沖劑對小鼠免疫性肝損傷有預防作用。

sentences.english: Conclusions Thrush was well prevented with 2% sodium bicarbonate.
sentences.chinese: 結論2%碳酸氫鈉清洗口腔可預防鵝口瘡。

sentences.english: The pit and fissure sealant have significant preventive effect on carious teeth.
sentences.chinese: 窩溝封閉能有效預防窩溝齲的發生。

definition: to be on guard/wariness/to guard against/preventive
to target/to focus on/to be aimed at or against/in response to
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
to have sth to do with/to relate to/related to/to concern/concerning
